thread.title: VIDEO: Get Your First Look at Fargo's Insane New Season
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Get Your First Look at Fargo's Insane New Season

author: TV Guide
title: VIDEO: Get Your First Look at Fargo's Insane New Season
text: Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 9:10 PM Updated at 11:57 PM Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 9:10 PM Updated at 11:57 PM Â» Social News FX has unveiled a new preview of Fargo 's second season, returning next week with more comedy, more tragedy - and a little bit less snow. A prequel of sorts to the first season, Fargo 's second season is set in 1979 in Sioux Falls, S.D., as a young Lou Solverson ( Patrick Wilson ) finds himself investigating a case involving a local crime family, a mob syndicate and a beautician ( Kirsten Dunst ) and her husband ( Jesse Plemmons ). "You can't just repeat yourself," creator Noah Hawley teases of the new season, "you've got to reinvent the whole thing." Take a look at what's coming up on Fargo : Fargo premieres Monday, Oct. 12 at 10/9c on FX. Other Links From TVGuide.com
